Package players

Interface Effect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AI, PhysicalPlayer, Player

    public interface Effect
    Lists the methods that needs to be implemented to apply effects on some cards. Implemented in the class Player.
    Author:
    Benjamin Héroult
    See Also:
    Player

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changeColor​()
      Allows the player to choose a new Color
      void changeDirection​()
      Executes the fact of changing the direction of the game
      void changePlayerTemp​(int number)
      Uses the function nextPlayer(int playerPos, Player currentPlayer) from the class Round to add cards to pick for the next player Used with the functions drawCard.
      void draw1Card​(Game game)
      Affects a penalty to the next player, by adding 1 to his count of cards to take
      void draw3Card​(Game game)
      Affects a penalty to the next player, by adding 3 to his count of cards to take
      boolean executeEffect​(Card card_to_play, Game game)
      Verifies if the card has an effect affected, and if so, execute this effect.
      void nextPlayerPass​()
      Makes the next player pass his turn
      void replay​()
      Allows the player to play ones again
      void stopAttacks​()
      Avoids the player to pick cards as penalties from other players.

    • Method Detail

      • changeColor

        void changeColor​()
        Allows the player to choose a new Color

      • replay

        void replay​()
        Allows the player to play ones again

      • nextPlayerPass

        void nextPlayerPass​()
        Makes the next player pass his turn

      • changeDirection

        void changeDirection​()
        Executes the fact of changing the direction of the game

      • draw1Card

        void draw1Card​(Game game)
        Affects a penalty to the next player, by adding 1 to his count of cards to take
        Parameters:
        game - used to call the method changePlayerTemp

      • draw3Card

        void draw3Card​(Game game)
        Affects a penalty to the next player, by adding 3 to his count of cards to take
        Parameters:
        game - used to call the method changePlayerTemp

      • stopAttacks

        void stopAttacks​()
        Avoids the player to pick cards as penalties from other players.

      • executeEffect

        boolean executeEffect​(Card card_to_play,
                      Game game)
        Verifies if the card has an effect affected, and if so, execute this effect.
        Parameters:
        card_to_play - the card that might have an effect
        game - used to call effects, mainly to defines the next player
        Returns:
        if the player finished his turn, true ; false if he must replay

      • changePlayerTemp

        void changePlayerTemp​(int number)
        Uses the function nextPlayer(int playerPos, Player currentPlayer) from the class Round to add cards to pick for the next player Used with the functions drawCard.
        Parameters:
        number - the number of cards to add to pick to the next player
